sentence.Network_en: He became an Augustinian monk and practised such asceticism that his health was impaired.
sentence.Network_cn: 他成为奥古斯丁时期的修士,他实行苦行主义以致身体受到了伤害.

sentence.Network_en: Finally their ashes were collected for relics by Augustinian monks.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后他们的骨灰被奥古斯丁的僧侣作为文物保留.

sentence.Network_en: The Chinese Augustinian teach, speaking the amenability filial piety.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国人信奉儒教, 讲顺从孝顺.
